name: SWARM OF VENOMOUS SNAKES
size_type_alignment: Medium Swarm of Tiny Beasts, Unaligned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage -or 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied-plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

raw_text:
AC 14 	Initiative +4 (14)
HP 36 (8d8)
Speed 30 ft., Swim 30 ft.
Medium Swarm of Tiny Beasts, Unaligned

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/Monster Manual/Animals - Monster Manual - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf
